## Get started

1.  Login to either
    -   **Duke's Virtual Software** [RStudio client](https://cmgr.oit.duke.edu/containers/RStudio) (uses NetID)

    -   [Posit.cloud](https://posit.cloud)

    -   You can also use your own local install of RStudio. I will teach from the cloud version.
2.  Start a new project by importing the github repository for this workshop
    -   <https://github.com/libjohn/tutorial_intro2r_datafest.git>
